product_description: A geo-patterned raffia strap brings boho-chic appeal to a slide sandal elevated by a sculptural cork-wrapped platform and block heel.
product_details_and_care:
A geo-patterned raffia strap brings boho-chic appeal to a slide sandal elevated by a sculptural cork-wrapped platform and block heel.
3 1/2" heel; 1 1/4" platform
Cushioned footbed
Leather and textile upper/synthetic lining and sole
Made in Italy
Women's Shoes
Item #6007514
